articles.content:
Crystal Palace manager Patrick Vieira will not face police charges following an altercation with a fan at Goodison Park after Merseyside Police said on Monday that no formal complaint was filed.

articles.author: Julian Bovill
articles.title: Liverpool pair Alisson and Henderson express frustration over missing out on Premier league title - Daily Mail
articles.description: City's dramatic 3-2 win at home to Aston Villa, having been 2-0 down with around 15 minutes remaining, meant there was nothing Liverpool could have done to have wrestled the title off City.
articles.content:
Liverpool players Alisson and Jordan Henderson have expressed their frustration on missing out on the Premier League title to Manchester City.
